Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory730.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What an exquisite place...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe stares at the stage beneath him and straightens his shirt subconsciously.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I can't help but feel out of place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're the only one who thinks that.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You don't like it here, Watanabe?", 3: '11'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "My preference has nothing to do with it. I'm just not used to being in a place like this.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe moves his wrists, seemingly at ease finally.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Now that I think about it, the Oasis hasn't celebrated a season like this in a long time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's time to take a break with the kids.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe furrows his brows as he speaks as if he is worrying about the Oasis again.'}
{2: 'Rest up before you go.', 3: '18'}
{3: 'Surprised by your words, Watanabe is stunned for a moment before turning silent.'}
{2: 'Even Constructs need to be careful not to overwork.', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're right. I should balance work and rest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I was just thinkingâ€”if Oasis builds a place like this in the future...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Will we be able to invite you to visit and tour the place, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course.', 3: '25', 4: 'It would be my pleasure.', 5: '25'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Oasis will certainly be a real Eden by then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Just like... what we imagined.', 4: '1'}
